title: Life, liberty and happiness
creator: nan
subject: Krieg 1914 1918
source: Life, liberty and happiness  so long as the administration is determined to keep the war going there is only one way for you to get out of this miserable fix and that is for you to stop fighting .... Berlin
alternative: so long as the administration is determined to keep the war going there is only one way for you to get out of this miserable fix and that is for you to stop fighting ...
